title: Shadows of Truth
description: When traumatic memories surface, Drea Hartman’s life unravels into rage, revenge, and self-destruction as she attempts to reconcile her past and her present life. Her search for answers and justice wreaks havoc on her relationships, threatens her faith, and tests her inner strength. Plunging into a downward spiral as each piece of the puzzle emerges from the darkness, she is caught between a desperate pursuit of truth and the desire to forget. Must she forgive in order to forget? Will Drea’s desperation keep her stuck in the bitter morass of self-pity or ignite her courage to change?Shadows of Truth depicts one woman's journey of breaking free from the anchor of trauma in her past and finding freedom and forgiveness in her future. It is an inspirational story of courage and faith during a time of emotional darkness. Sensitive and powerful, the story is painstakingly truthful in its description of the downward spiral into depression, rage and revenge, and ultimately showing how desperation can ignite courage and how deep pain can lead to great strength.
author: Angie Robinson
